title: Minister of State to the Government
text: The Minister of State to the Government was a <a href="Minister%20of%20State%20%28Ireland%29">junior ministerial</a> post of the <a href="Government%20of%20Ireland">Government of Ireland</a> between 1994 and 2002. The Minister of State did not hold <a href="Cabinet%20%28government%29">cabinet</a> rank but sat in attendance at government meetings without a vote. The position previously existed as the Parliamentary Secretary to the Executive Council from 1922 to 1926, and as Parliamentary Secretary to the Government from 1951 to 1957.
